general_advisory: Dry weather may prevail with partly cloudy skies. Maintain optimal conditions for nursery sowing and early growth of crops. Proper pest surveillance and control measures are advised.

advisory: Apply Cartap Hydrochloride or Chlorantraniliprole for gall midge, stem borer, caseworm, leaf folder, and root knot nematode management.
Select resistant varieties like CO-7219, CO-8371, etc. for red rot disease prevention.
Soak setts in a solution containing carbendazim, chlorpyriphos, and urea before planting.
Spray Neem Based Pesticide or Profenophos for leaf miner control.
Use yellow sticky traps for Whitefly control in Tomato.
Spray neem-based pesticide or Thiamethoxam for pest control.
Apply compost, DAP, Murate of Potash, urea, and sulphur before transplanting in the main field.
Spray Ethion, Spiromesifen, or Propargite for mite control.
Spray Fenamidone + Mancozeb or Cymoxanil + Mancozeb for leaf blight control.
Apply carbendazim for stem rot control.
Use carbofuran to control root knot nematode.
Insulate poultry house against cold wind during winter.
Provide mineral and calcium to laying birds.
